author: pipermerriam
content:
Cross posting here.  Would like client team feedback on whether we should bump the `eth` protocol version

Argument for and against bumping will be aggregated here: https://notes.ethereum.org/M41Oj3WyRVSC36Rr0c-Tjg

I believe <@&688101493978562687> had some opposition which I don't feel confident enough in my memory to accurately write down, so it'd be helpful if someone from that can provide me with a write up of their stance.

Those that plan to pursue EIP-7801 based solution, it would be nice to know if the proposed ideas in the document are acceptable solutions.
